titles.title: A bill to require the Secretary of Energy to carry out a program relating to physical security and cybersecurity for pipelines and liquefied natural gas facilities.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation.

bill.summary:
Pipeline and LNG Facility Cybersecurity Preparedness Act
This bill requires the Department of Energy to implement a program to ensure the security, resiliency, and survivability of natural gas pipelines, hazardous liquid pipelines, and liquefied natural gas facilities.
